positions.subtitle: Jaguar Land Rover India
positions.description: Health Managementâ€¢ Developed a Diagnostic Fault Manager in C++ tailored for automotive systems, effectively managing Diagnostic Trouble Codes (DTCs) and seamlessly interfacing with error handlers to ensure dependable vehicle diagnosticsâ€¢ Engineered a highly reliable Safe Fault Manager in C++ for automotive ECUs, integrating PHM watchdog monitoring to promptly initiate recovery protocols upon detecting critical system failures, enhancing operational resilience.â€¢ Implemented an efficient Asynchronous Service Finder in C++ using Lambda functions, optimizing connection establishment across diverse automotive interfaces to support responsive system functionality.â€¢ Utilized Google Test and gMock frameworks to conduct rigorous Unit Testing for automotive software, meticulously validating functionality and ensuring adherence to industry standards through dynamic interface simulation.â€¢ Led comprehensive end-to-end testing on actual vehicles, ensuring flawless communication and functionality validation, pivotal in achieving regulatory compliance and readiness for certification in automotive environments.
positions.title: Software Engineer 2
positions.description_html:
Health Management
â€¢ Developed a Diagnostic Fault Manager in C++ tailored for automotive systems, effectively managing Diagnostic Trouble Codes (DTCs) and seamlessly interfacing with error handlers to ensure dependable vehicle diagnostics
â€¢ Engineered a highly reliable Safe Fault Manager in C++ for automotive ECUs, integrating PHM watchdog monitoring to promptly initiate recovery protocols upon detecting critical system failures, enhancing operational resilience.
â€¢ Implemented an efficient Asynchronous Service Finder in C++ using Lambda functions, optimizing connection establishment across diverse automotive interfaces to support responsive system functionality.
â€¢ Utilized Google Test and gMock frameworks to conduct rigorous Unit Testing for automotive software, meticulously validating functionality and ensuring adherence to industry standards through dynamic interface simulation.
â€¢ Led comprehensive end-to-end testing on actual vehicles, ensuring flawless communication and functionality validation, pivotal in achieving regulatory compliance and readiness for certification in automotive environments.

positions.subtitle: Jaguar Land Rover India
positions.description: Model in Loop/ Software in Loopâ€¢ Implemented comprehensive end-to-end process, leveraging Behave framework, to seamlessly manage test scheduling, execution & report generation, empowering stakeholders to effortlessly conduct Gherkin-based tests on SiL rigsâ€¢ Engineered test framework facilitating gateway testing and seamlessly integrated it with different vehicle carlines that empowers left shifting and significantly reduce testing effortsâ€¢ Created GUI using PyQt5, enabling users to select different configurations & efficiently stack multiple testsâ€¢ Conceptualized an optimized folder structure & aligned the Simulink model, resulting in the creation of a Git repository to elevate developer synergy in integrating the incoming plant models from suppliersâ€¢ Executed automated and streamlined solutions to eliminate repetitive tasks, enhancing overall operational efficiency
positions.title: Graduate Software Engineer Trainee
positions.description_html:
Model in Loop/ Software in Loop
â€¢ Implemented comprehensive end-to-end process, leveraging Behave framework, to seamlessly manage test scheduling, execution & report generation, empowering stakeholders to effortlessly conduct Gherkin-based tests on SiL rigs
â€¢ Engineered test framework facilitating gateway testing and seamlessly integrated it with different vehicle carlines that empowers left shifting and significantly reduce testing efforts
â€¢ Created GUI using PyQt5, enabling users to select different configurations & efficiently stack multiple tests
â€¢ Conceptualized an optimized folder structure & aligned the Simulink model, resulting in the creation of a Git repository to elevate developer synergy in integrating the incoming plant models from suppliers
â€¢ Executed automated and streamlined solutions to eliminate repetitive tasks, enhancing overall operational efficiency
